name: XiomiCleanTheKitchen
0:
”Alexa ask clean bot to clean the kitchen”
”Alexa ask clean bot to confirm clean the kitchen”
”Alexa ask clean bot to charge”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: clean bot
des:
Effortlessly control your Xiaomi vacuum robot with Alexa. Simply use voice commands through Alexa to clean each room with precision and efficiency. Customize cleaning routines and enjoy a hassle-free cleaning experience.
Enable Clean Bot skill and register on the xiomi-clean-the-kitchen.de, Download the Xiomi Clean the Kitchen app from Playstore on your Android device and experience seamless integration with Alexa.
